channel.title: Mini-Developement Team - RageScape
channel.description:
[center]~RageScape~
Welcome - I've been making a server called RageScape for a while now and well - i just cant finish it without some help; not too much just a little like commands etc..of course you can work as much as you like :)
[b]You need at least 20 rep or a known status for coding to join[/b] [b]FORUMS ARE www.ragescape.co.nr PLEASE JOIN IF YOU GET ACCEPTED[/b]
[b]Current Team :[/b]
-Killah246 [Rage] - - -
[u][b]Coders:[/b][/u]
-Killah246 [Rage] - - -
[u][b]Independent Coders [Code whatever they want then give to me][/b][/u]
-Killah246 [Rage] - - -
~~~~~~~~~~~~~ [u][i][b]Current Updates:[/b][/i][/u] [b][TESTSCAPE SOURCE][/b]
[b]1)[/b] Added Full Range. 2) Fixed D Scim. 3) Added Full Working Defense Bonuses. 4) Added 100% Firemaking 5) Added 98% Full Runcrafting 6) Added Monkey GreeGrees. 7) Added 100% Glass Crafting Cool Added Item On Item Fix 9) Added Fight Pits (PVP) [b]10)[/b] Added 100% Item.java 11) Added Auto Save 12) Added Ring Of Stone 13) Added Genie Lamps 14) Added ::char Command Fix 15) Added Taverly Dungeon 16) Added Stat Bug Fix 17) Added Text On Screen Void 18) Added More Parse Space 19) Added 100% PickPocketing [b]20)[/b] Added Tree Growing 21) Added Guthans Draining Health Fix 22) Added Enter Wild/Left Wild Message 23) Added Fishing Guild 24) Added Gem Crafting 25) Added Full Ancients 26) Added Ancients Tab 27) Added ::levelup Command 28) Added Anti-Null 29) Added Crown Fix-up [b]30)[/b] Added pSay Void 31) Added Tutorial Island 32) Added 2h Fix To ALL 2hs 33) Added NPC Facing 34) Added Untradable Item 35) Added Zenzie's Drop Item Thingy 36) Added Global Objects Void 37) Added Deleting Objects Void 38) Added Cant Move Before ::rules Thingy 39) Added Mod Area Spawns [b]40)[/b] Added Full Preeching 41) Added Player Facing Player While Fighting 42) Added Trimming Skill 43) Added Some Hp To Some Monsters 44) Added Drill Demon Random Event 45) Added Barrows = 0 When You Die 46) Added AntiCheat By SamuraiBlood2 47) Added Advanced Players Online List 48) Added FrugooScape's Anti Crash 49) Added Zanris [b]50)[/b] Added My Zombie Graveyard 51) Added My Full Mith Seeds 52) Added More NPCS 53) Added Tele All To Me Void 54) Changed Hobgoblins And Tyras Guards 55) Added More Shops + Added items 2 Shops 56) Fixed A Few Things 57) Made Player's Bank Space bigger 58) Added Item On Npc Fix 59) Taken Away My Firemaking V1 [b]60) [/b]Added My Firemaking V.2 61) Added Some Tele Commands 62) Added Alot Of Weapon Fixes(food) 63) Added ::starter (my own version) 64) Added ::runekit (For People Who Need Rune) 65) Added Another Training Area 66) Added FULL Whip Spec 67) Reduced More Lag. 68) Removed old mithril seeds 69) Added NEW mithril seeds! [b]70)[/b] Changed currency name from 'coins' to 'money' 71) Added working projectiles 72) Changed a few items prices 73) Added 'The Timber Limber' log shop (Supports Multi-Firemaking)
~~~~~ [b]Layout:[/b] [b]**Required [But filling the others could further your chance][/b]
[code][b]Real Name:[/b] [b]**Experience:[/b] [b]**Proof of experience:[/b] [b]**Position Wanted:[/b] [b]Age:[/b] [b]Extra Comments:[/b] [b]MSN:[/b][/code]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[i][b]Thanks for reading.[/b][/i][/center]

item.title: Mini-Developement Team - RageScape
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

~Jake, Killah’s not the one that needs to be reported, Gomeman is, he’s the one that bumped up a 2 year old worthless thread.

[center]~RageScape~

Welcome - I’ve been making a server called RageScape for a while now
